text: The Left Hand of Darkness is a science fiction book that was written by Ursula K. Le Guin in 1969. It won the 1969 Nebula and 1970 Hugo awards. == Translations == * , 1985, 1997 * , 2004 (ISBN 978-953-203-182-9) * * * * * * * , also known as Winterplanet (Heyne-Verlag paperback edition, translated by Gisela Stege) * * and later as * , 1979, 2015 * * 1995, 2002 * * * * , 1991, 1992, 1993, 1999, 2006 * * * * ==Notes== ==References== ==Further reading== * * * ==Other websites== * Bibliography: The Left Hand of Darkness at the Internet Speculative Fiction Database * Audio review and discussion of The Left Hand of Darkness at The Science Fiction Book Review Podcast Category:1969 books Category:Hainish Cycle Category:Hugo Award winning books
title: The Left Hand of Darkness
